features.title: Go Faster. Deliver sooner.
features.description: We are agile, collaborative teachers who do. We aren’t consultants. We apply just the right amount of structure to remove chaos, and replace it with velocity. Organized but never bureaucratic.

features.title: We speak business tongues
features.description: We are business people who know technology – all forms of technology. We have centuries of combined experience across major business verticals like healthcare, manufacturing, retail, and healthcare (yep, we said that twice). We love cool tech. We deliver cool tech. We don’t hawk cool tech. We promote business solutions.

features.title: Create real value
features.description: “Value” isn’t measured by the number of lines of code you get per dollar. Value comes from delivering secure, compliant solutions that connect with your consumers. We have the skillset to help you ideate, define and build a superior solution. If you agree with our definition of “value”, let’s dance!

testimonials.name: Bringing teams and systems together into one cohesive element that shifts the organizational mindset from functional domains, and the fodder needed to support them, back to a singular focus onto business products, their market fit and the technology that enables them.
Agility, curiosity and the willingness to fly fearlessly into the sun as a progressive team builder and assembler of ‘start-up’ minded and spirited innovators.

Understanding that each client faces unique challenges, immersing into a project by interacting with current and potential users. This ethnographic research coupled with clinical UX methodologies provide the background and tools necessary to deliver usercentric products.
Most in his element while working in the disciplines of database and application design, full-stack software development, and software architecture.
Fashioning software alongside integrated teams creating kick-ass products that are highly secure, reliable and scalable.
Connecting complex technical architecture with an intuitive user experience, all while being able to communicate in a digestible way with clients.

processSteps.title: AI/ML software.
processSteps.description: We partnered to architect and build the front-end and integration services for early breast cancer detection app.

processSteps.title: FHIR-compliant flow
processSteps.description: We have streamlined, integrated and automated the FHIR-compliant flow of information between all elements of the healthcare supply chain – Payer to Delivery

processSteps.title: Interfaces and Architectures
processSteps.description: We designed next-generation interfaces and architectures to facilitate government mandated Interoperability between Patients and Physicians

processSteps.title: Real Estate
processSteps.description: We are developing the technologies to redefine and improve the information and convenience of services between home buyers and sellers, brokers, real estate agents and mortgage companies

processSteps.title: State Government
processSteps.description: We conceptualized a differentiated consumer-centric solution for use by any and all branches of the state government
